span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】adj. 持续不断的：continuing or following without interruption
【例】 The incessant noise from an outside repair crew was a real distraction during the test. 窗外维修工发出的持续不断的噪音着实让人在考试里分心
【近】 ceaseless, continual, nonstop, perpetual, running, unbroken, unceasing, uninterrupted, unremitting
【反】 interrupted 中断的；discontinuous, intermittent 有间断的
【记】 in 不+ cessant停止
【另】 cessation 停止，cease 停止
